section.p: You knock back the wine before you have time to gag. It feels like your insides are being scoured out with a wire brush. An instant later the alcohol fumes hit your brain. The effect is similar to being half drowned and then held over a bonfire.

Lose 1 point permanently
from all your ability scores except SANCTITY.
One thing’s for sure - you can’t handle much of this stuff.

choices.choice: Offer him faery mead if you have it
